name: Little Quest Room: Horror VHS
description:
Become a night guard at a deserted cinema in the game "Little Quest Room: Horror VHS". Your first shift starts with finding a strange video cassette that transports you inside the film. Now, you must solve puzzles and riddles to escape the tiny horror world and return to reality.

Features:

- Nice minimalistic graphics in 3D pixel art style

- Addictive game play

- 3D levels with tiny room rotation mechanics that can and should be rotated to explore them from different angle.

- Variety of locations with Easter eggs and parodies of famous films. - Interactive world

- Many riddles and puzzles
